title: Younger Sister Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>It is an honor to talk with you today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan is honored too, Dia-chan...... After all, today is......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Younger Sister Day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Younger Sister Day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Let’s begin by talking about Ruby. Ruby is—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>No, no. Let’s begin with Haruka-chan. Haruka-chan is—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My apologies, but I am speaking right now, Kanata-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan wants to go first!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Mm......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
